title: Parenting Lunch
deck: Using the new Parenting for Faith videos
article:
Do you have children or young people in your family? Do you want to spend time connecting with other families? Are you interested in supporting children and families develop in faith?

Join us for our parenting lunches after church on the second Sunday of each month.

We eat together, watch a short video to inspire us as we parent children in their faith, and share together ideas/epic fails/success stories of how God is and can use us to help our children grow in faith.

We are using brand new videos from Parenting for Faith to inspire us on our journey.

Bring some food to share. There will be toys and games available for children to play with (but please be aware that supervised childcare will not be provided and you will remain responsible for your own children).

These lunches are open to anyone who is interested in helping children and young people grow in their faith. We would especially love to see families coming along, whether you have done the Parenting for Faith course in the past or not â€“ these lunches are for all of you!
